Package server.net

Class ServerProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.net.ServerProtocol
  • public class ServerProtocol
extends java.lang.Object
    This class mainly contains methods to process input to function as a server protocol by checking incoming messages and triggering responses/commands.

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public static void process​(java.lang.String input,
                           java.lang.String name)
        This method takes the input and looks for specific characters to decide whether or not it is a command. If a command is given, an according response is triggered. If no command is recognized it will be sent as a Chat message. Right now the possible commands are as followed:

        /lout to log out

        /dmsg to send a direct message / whisper message

        /nick to change nickname

        /ping is soon to be added

        /list to display a list of all players online

        /move to process a move

        /lbby to create a lobby

        /join to join an existing lobby

        /leav to leave a lobby

        /loli to see a list of lobbies.

        /cast to send a message to all players online.

        /read to set the player in the lobby to ready.

        /unrd to set the player in the lobby to not ready.

        /dqed to disqualify a player in a race.

        /help to see all available commands.

        /wins to see your highscore.

        default is now set to send messages inside the lobby the player is in

        Parameters:
        input - message/command coming in from the user
        name - name of person giving input

      • broadcastMessage

        public static void broadcastMessage​(java.lang.String message,
                                    java.lang.String name)
        Sends a message to all connected players and shows who sent the message.
        Parameters:
        message - gives content of message to be displayed.
        name - name of person sending message

      • sendDirectMessage

        public static void sendDirectMessage​(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String recipient,
                                     java.lang.String message)
        Sends a message to a chosen player given in the list and shows the Server, from whom to whom the message was sent.
        Parameters:
        name - name of person sending message
        recipient - name of person receiving
        message - gives content of message to be displayed

      • lobbyMessage

        public static void lobbyMessage​(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String message,
                                java.lang.String lobbyName)
        Sends a message inside the current lobby. If no lobby is available the user gets according feedback.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the person sending the message
        message - content of the message sent
        lobbyName - name of the according lobby

      • checkName

        public static java.lang.String checkName​(java.lang.String name)
        Checks whether a chosen name is already taken. If so, the method will append a number to the chosen name.
        Parameters:
        name - name to check for.
        Returns:
        the new name assigned to the player.

      • changeUsername

        public static void changeUsername​(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String newName)
        If called, the name of the user is changed to the newName parameter. The requested name is then checked for duplicates.
        Parameters:
        name - player to change the username.
        newName - what the name will be changed to.
